channel.title: [richscape]Random dying by a fire ball&adding shops,please help
channel.description:
Alright Im using rich scape's source but theres not a "wanneshop" code in the sources client.java,
im trying to add this shop; [code]12 Ryhnos_Rares 1 1 6857 50000 6856 50000 6859 50000 6858 50000 7612 500000 7607 10000000 7606 10000000 2746 120000000 2748 13000000 2747 50000000 2745 30000000[/code]
Also,whenever i kick someone,or i disconnect the server and they log back in a random fireball just appears and kills them,any ideas?

item.title: [richscape]Random dying by a fire ball&adding shops,please help
item.dc:creator: @Darkning Darkning
item.description:
@Darkning wrote:

the random fireball could be an anti-leech or just try to change the starting point.

with the shop…well the numbers shouldnt be all together like that use a tab to seperate
